title: (x) Fast Company logo and cover titles - custom drawn, Benton Sans {Yves, Mark S}
content:
Can anybody tell me what font is fast company magazine, tks.

 [‹ (x) Swiss International Air Lines logo sans - CH Sans (custom face) {Rainer}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225759/http:/typophile.com/node/43566 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Serif face used on Hiroshi Sugimoto homepage - Simoncini Garamond {Akira} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225759/http:/typophile.com/node/43591 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Coca

comments.content: What do you need — the magazine logo (most probably custom drawn) or the cover titles (Benton Sans by the looks of it)?

The logo is not a font. Custom design by Jim Parkinson: [http://www.typedesign.com/logos/fast.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20080328225759/http:/www.typedesign.com/logos/fast.html "http://www.typedesign.com/logos/fast.html")
